member.name: F:JY6302.JYLogLevel.DEBUG
member.summary: DEBUG Level指出细粒度信息事件对调试应用程序是非常有帮助的

member.name: F:JY6302.JYLogLevel.INFO
member.summary: INFO level表明 消息在粗粒度级别上突出强调应用程序的运行过程

member.name: F:JY6302.JYLogLevel.WARN
member.summary: WARN level表明会出现潜在错误的情形。

member.name: F:JY6302.JYLogLevel.ERROR
member.summary: ERROR level指出虽然发生错误事件，但仍然不影响系统的继续运行。

member.name: F:JY6302.JYLogLevel.FATAL
member.summary: FATAL level指出每个严重的错误事件将会导致应用程序的退出。

member.name: T:JY6302.JYLog
member.summary: 日志打印类，用于在程序逻辑中打印一些日记记录到文件，方便调试程序， 同时客户使用时如果遇到问题，也可以使能日志打印的功能，方便定位错误的原因

member.name: F:JY6302.JYLog._logMsgQ
member.summary: 用于日志消息缓存的队列，首次调用时初始化

member.name: M:JY6302.JYLog.Print(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: 写入日志文件,需要定义宏ENABLELOG 或 DEBUG，此方法兼容旧版

member.name: M:JY6302.JYLog.Print(JY6302.JYLogLevel,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: 写入日志文件,需要定义宏ENABLELOG 或 DEBUG

member.name: M:JY6302.JYLog.FuncWriteLog
member.summary: 轮询日志队列的定时器回调函数

member.summary: 当前配置不能调用该方法

member.summary: AI已经启动，不用添加通道

member.name: F:JY6302.JYErrorCode.ErrorParam1
member.summary: 输入幅值范围不正确,范围最大值和最小值

member.name: T:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic
member.summary: 驱动常用错误代码枚举定义

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.IncorrectCallOrder
member.summary: 调用顺序不正确，AI任务结束且各通道待读取的样点数大于当前缓冲区内每通道可以读取的点数时不允许读取数据

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.CannotCall
member.summary: 当前配置不能调用该方法,

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.UserBufferError
member.summary: 用户缓冲区错误，ReadData时缓冲区的长度小于采样点数，ReadRawData或GetRecordPreviewData时缓冲区数组的行数 小于每通道采样点数或者列数小于通道数

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.BufferOverflow
member.summary: 缓冲区溢出,缓冲区设置太小

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.BufferDownflow
member.summary: 缓冲区下溢出, 本地缓冲区中的数据不足。

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.aiIsStart
member.summary: AI已经启动，不用添加或者删除通道，连续模式不允许未调用Start而读取数据

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.RangeError
member.summary: 添加通道时输入幅值范围不正确,范围最大值和最小值应大于0且最小值应小于最大值

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.terminalCfgError
member.summary: 新添加的通道配置方式与已添加的不一致

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.AddChnIdError
member.summary: 新添加或者删除的通道号小于0或者通道号超出索引范围,输入通道号应为大于0，且在伪差分模式时为（0-7），单端模式是（0-15）

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.AddChnIdsError
member.summary: 添加多通道，输入通道号数组超出索引范围，在伪差分模式时为（0-7），单端模式是（0-15）

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.RawDataLenError
member.summary: 进行Scale转换的原始数据RawData的长度与设置不一致

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.ErrorSamplesperChannel
member.summary: 读原始数据时，各通道待读取的样点数要大于0

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.UserBufferLenError
member.summary: 单点模式下读取数据数组元素个数与通道数不一致

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.ConfigDoubleBufferError
member.summary: config double buffer failed！(配置双缓冲失败)

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.AOIncorrectCallOrder
member.summary: 调用顺序不正确，AO任务结束且各通道待更新的样点数大于当前缓冲区内每通道可以更新的点数时不允许写入数据

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.AOIsStart
member.summary: AO已经启动，不用添加通道或者删除通道

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.ErrorSampleToUpdate
member.summary: 有限点模式下，写入原始数据每通道更新率应大于0

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.AOUserBufferError
member.summary: 用户缓冲区错误，原始数据写入缓存的列数应大于或等于通道数或者在有限点模式下每通道写入的样点数应大于或等于每通道更新点数。

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.IncorrectWriteCallOrder
member.summary: AO连续环绕模式下任务已启动，此时不允许写入。

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.IncorrectWriteUseBuff
member.summary: AOContinuousNoWrapping模式，首次写入的点数应大于30*1024点

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.CINotStart
member.summary: CI任务没有开始不能调用ReadCounter

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.ExternalClockRateError
member.summary: CI使用了外部时钟源，但是设置的外部时钟频率应该大于0

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.CONotStart
member.summary: CO启动之后再配置应用参数。

member.name: F:JY6302.JYDriverExceptionPublic.LineNumError
member.summary: 添加的位号索引不正确,索引范围应为0-7

member.summary: 用户缓冲区不足,缓冲区的长度小于通道位号的长度

member.name: P:JY6302.WaitEvent.ConditionHandler
member.summary: 执行此操作，返回值为true时，发出（Set）事件（Event）；否则不发出事件。

member.name: P:JY6302.WaitEvent.IsEnabled
member.summary: 事件是否处于被等待状态

summary.para: 加入事件队列，并等待一段时间，判断事件是否触发。
若检测到ConditionHandler()或者timeout为0，立即返回，不使用Event.

member.name: M:JY6302.WaitEvent.Wait(System.Int32)
member.summary: 等待一段时间，判断事件是否发出。（不加入事件队列） 若检测到ConditionHandler()或者timeout为0，立即返回，不使用Event.

summary.para: 循环缓冲链类，将CircularBufferEx链起来
优点：不用预先分配较大的内存，当程序运行时不够用了再按块增加
使用注意：块大小要合适，不能太小，也不能太大。
----太小：增加内存拷贝的次数，消耗CPU资源；
推荐分配块大小为入队和出队数据量的4~16倍

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302Import.JY6302_AI_EnableChannel(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.UInt32[],System.UInt32[])
member.param: 要使能的通道的物理序号

members.member:
设置采样率
板卡句柄 要设置的采样率，每个AD芯片上最高合采样率跟所设的转换率大小有关 /// 要设置的转换率档位，6档可选(0-5)，或设为-1，函数内部将在优先满足要求的采样率的前提下，尽可能选择较低的转换率以达到最优噪声抑制。转换率和单芯片上的通道数最大值共同限制最大采样率。 实际生效的采样率 实际生效的转换率，即每一次AD转换所需要的时间的倒数。转换率越高，噪声越大 0：无错误；其它：发生错误

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302Import.JY6302_AI_GetActualSampleRate(System.Double,System.Int32,System.UInt32[],System.UInt32,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: 获取实际可取的采样率和转换率，不会实际进行配置
member.param: 要设置的采样率，每个AD芯片上最高可设合800Sa/s
要设置的转换率档位，6档可选(0-5)，或设为-1，函数内部将在优先满足要求的采样率的前提下，尽可能选择较低的转换率以达到最优噪声抑制。转换率和单芯片上的通道数最大值共同限制最大采样率。
当前使用的通道拓扑结构
当前所有使能的通道的物理索引值
当前使能的通道的数量
实际生效的转换率，即每一次AD转换所需要的时间的倒数。转换率越高，噪声越大

member.param: 选择要查询的Connector. 0: Connector0(Right); 1: Connector1(Left)

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302Import.JY6302_AI_QueryRJTemperature(System.IntPtr,System.UInt32,System.Double@)

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302Import.JY6302_AI_DetectOpenThermocouple(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[],System.Int32)
member.param: 用于获取转换结果的数组，其长度与通道数一致。接近满量程(0xFFFFFF)的读书可能意味着前端传感器开路、过载或缺少基准电压源，缺少基准电压还体现在convError对应的位为1；如果转换结果为0，则可能是传感器短路

member.name: T:JY6302.JY6302AITask
member.summary: JY6302 AI task class which applies to temperature measurements using the Type R/S/B/J/T/E/K/N/C/A thermocouple(max input voltage +-78.125mV).

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor. Used to create an AI task object by board number.
member.param: The slot number where the board is located, the first board will be opened when 0 is given.

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor. Used to create an AI task object by board name.
member.param: Board name(device alias), set by device manager

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._userRequiredConvertRateIndex
member.summary: 用户要求的转换率的索引值

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._actualConvertRateIndex
member.summary: 实际生效的转换率等级

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._allowBuildInCJC
member.summary: 该变量用于确定用户是否可调用使用TB68CJ数据做冷端补偿。当用户未使能TB68CJ时，使用用户设置的冷端温度做冷端补偿

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._chnsID
member.summary: 所有通道的物理ID，用于获取可用采样率时传入，防止重复new

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._result
member.summary: 导入函数执行后的返回值，若不为0表示发生了错误

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._circularBuffer
member.summary: 流盘模式下预览数据缓冲区

member.name: F:JY6302.JY6302AITask._tempHotJunctionData
member.summary: 该数组用于从API中读取参考端数据，再将该数组的数据按通道按通道拷贝到用户的读取数组中。为了避免频繁new新的数组，采用了一个局部变量，当检测到数组长度改变时才会new

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.Device
member.summary: The device instance called by this AI task instance.

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.BuildInCJCEnabled
member.summary: Build-in cold junction compensation enabled. If enabled, the task automatically performs cold junction compensation based on the temperature sensor data on the terminal block, and the connection status will be checked when starting the task. If disabled, you must set the cold junction temperature on each channel manually, the default value is 0℃.

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.TimingMode
member.summary: Timing mode, can be set to automatic, or manually selected as level 0 to level 5. This parameter directly affects the input noise suppression performance. The smaller the speed class, the better the suppression of noise, but the maximum total sampling rate that can be set is also smaller.

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.MaxSampleRate
member.summary: The maximum total sampling rate at the current timing mode.

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.SampleRate
member.summary: Sampling rate per channel (S/s). The minimum is 0.275S/s and the maximum is 800S/s. The actual sampling rate is subject to the timing mode, the number of channels, and the rounding operation. You can read this property to obtain the sampling rate that will actually take effect in the current configuration. This property is invalid when is .

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.ConvertRate
member.summary: Convert rate (A/D conversion frequency) in effect in the current configuration

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.SamplesToAcquire
member.summary: Number of sampling points to be read per channel. Only valid when is .

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.AvailableSamples
member.summary: Number of points per channel that can be read in the buffer.

member.name: P:JY6302.JY6302AITask.Trigger
member.summary: AI trigger property configured by AI Trigger().

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.AddChannel(System.Int32,JY6302.ThermocoupleType,System.Double)
member.summary: Add one/all channel(s), and automatically determine the input voltage range based on the type of thermocouple.
member.param: Channel's physical number. chnId = -1: add all channels.
The type of thermocouple connected to this channel.

Customized cold junction (reference junction) temperature (℃) for compensation. This parameter is only valid when buld-in cold-junction compensation disabled ( = false ) and then take effect every time the ReadData method is called.

member.param: Channel's physical ID. chnId = -1: add all channels.

Customized cold junction (reference junction) temperature (℃) for compensation. This parameter is only valid when buld-in cold-junction compensation disabled ( = false ) and then take effect every time the ReadData method is called.

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.RemoveChannel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the channel with the specified channel ID.
member.param: Specified channel ID. chnId = -1: remove all channels.

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.SetCJTemperature(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.summary: Set cold junction (reference junction) temperature with a specified channel ID. These parameter are only valid when buld-in cold-junction compensation disabled ( = false ).
member.param: Specified channel ID, this channle must already has been added. chnId = -1: set this temperature to all channels that has been added.

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.SetCJTemperature(System.Double[])
member.summary: Set cold junction (reference junction) temperature to all channels that has been added. These parameter are only valid when buld-in cold-junction compensation disabled ( = false ).
member.param: Cold junction (reference juntion) temperature in ℃. The ordering of the elements must be the same as the order in which the channels are added.

member.name: M:JY6302.JY6302AITask.ReadRawData(System.Double[]@,System.Double[]@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read one or multi-channel raw data and store it in buffer. This method will copy the data of the hot(measuring) junction and the cold(reference) junction to user buffer respectively. Both arrays must have the same size. The ordering of the data in the two arrays is consistent.
member.param: User buffer used to read measured electromotive force. Unit: V.
User buffer used to read measured cold(reference) junction temperature. Unit: ℃.
Timeout in ms before generate tiemout exception, timeout =-1 keep waiting until finish.
